post.author: Jx423
post.body:
In the Inspectors window, only the "Entity" and "Textures" buttons are available. To continue with my map, I need to access the "Media" button, but it doesn't show up.

I've searched the forum and can't find any solutions.

How can I fix this?

EDIT: The Media button was hidden under the Windows taskbar. It wasn't in the Inspector window because it wasn't collapsed. Problem solved.

post.author: bkt
post.body: if you ever have anything go missing that you can't figure out, just remove editor.cfg from your base folder. That will reset radiant to it's default layout.

post.author: Jx423
post.body:
In the Inspectors window, only the "Entity" and "Textures" buttons are available. To continue with my map, I need to access the "Media" button, but it doesn't show up.

I've searched the forum and can't find any solutions.

EDIT: The Media button was hidden under the Windows taskbar. It wasn't in the Inspector window because it wasn't collapsed. Problem solved.

post.author: bkt
post.body: if you ever have anything go missing that you can't figure out, just remove editor.cfg from your base folder. That will reset radiant to it's default layout.
